overview: After finding a used condom in a married couple's trash can, Janine had an idea. Months later, she returned home when the woman went on a business trip to meet John and tell him that she is pregnant with his baby. She wants him to treat her like his wife during the week Holly was gone in exchange for her silence. Terry, a creepy teacher and stepdad to Jill, uses his power and threatens to use his influence at school to pressure his stepdaughter to fuck him, after she was rude to him.
title: One Man's Trash
